  • Strong architectural understanding of component design, modularization, micro frontends, and code reuse strategies.
  • Experience with state management tools like Redux Toolkit, Zustand, or Recoil.
  • In-depth understanding of accessibility, cross-browser compatibility, and responsive design.
  • Proficient in Git workflows, npm/yarn/pnpm, and modern IDEs like VSCode.
  • Solid testing practices using unit, integration, and visual regression testing tools.
  • Experience working in monorepos, Module Federation, or multi-team frontend architectures.
  • Familiarity with server-side rendering, static site generation, and edge rendering with Next.js.
  • Experience with containerized environments (Docker) for front-end dev environments.
  • Exposure to RAG, Langchain, or other LLM-based integrations in front-end workflows.
  • Skilled in cross-functional collaboration tools: Figma, Zeplin, Adobe XD, Jira, Confluence.
  • Strong advocacy for performance, UX, accessibility, and clean code practices.

Professional Attributes:

  • A passion for clean code and scalable architecture.
  • Strong communication and mentorship skills, with experience onboarding and upskilling developers.
  • Ability to lead through influence and evangelize best practices in front-end engineering.
  • Proactive in problem-solving, with a mindset of ownership and continuous improvement.

Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai Website: http://www.reizendretail.in

job_description:
Motion Graphics Designer (Animation / Effects)

Globcom Solutions (P) Ltd Module 2502, 5th floor, Yamuna Building Technopark Phase -3, Thiruvananthapuram , 695583 http://www.globcomsolution.com

Closing Date: 31, Aug 2025 Job Published: 09, Aug 2025 Contact Email: rajesh@globcomsolution.com

Location: Technopark, TVM

Role Overview: We are looking for a creative and skilled Motion Graphics Designer with 2 to 5 years of experience, who is passionate about creating visually stunning animations and effects for digital content. The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in motion graphics, 2D/3D animation, and visual effects, with proficiency in industry-standard tools.

The role requires someone who can transform concepts into engaging visuals, work collaboratively with creative teams, and deliver high-quality output within deadlines. Experience in creating promotional videos, social media creatives, and explainer animations will be highly valued.

Responsibilities: - Design and produce high-quality motion graphics, animations, and visual effects for videos, social media, and digital campaigns. - Collaborate with the creative, marketing, and development teams to conceptualize and execute visual ideas. - Work on storyboards, style frames, and animatics to plan animation sequences. - Create 2D/3D animations, kinetic typography, and compositing using After Effects, Cinema 4D, Blender, or similar tools. - Edit and enhance videos with transitions, effects, and sound design to achieve a polished final output. - Ensure brand consistency across all visual assets. - Stay updated on design trends, animation techniques, and emerging tools in motion graphics. - Optimize animation files for different platforms and formats. - Manage multiple projects simultaneously while meeting quality and timeline requirements.

Preferred Skills/Requirements: - 2 to 5 years of professional experience in motion graphics, animation, or visual effects. - Proficiency in Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Illustrator, and at least one 3D software (Cinema 4D, Blender, Maya, etc.). - Strong understanding of animation principles, timing, and visual storytelling. - Experience in compositing, rotoscoping, and visual effects integration. - Knowledge of color grading, typography, and layout design. - Ability to work collaboratively in a team and communicate creative ideas effectively. - Strong attention to detail and time management skills. - Bonus: Experience with AI-assisted design tools, VR/AR animation, or interactive media.

How to Apply: Send your resume, portfolio/reel link, and a brief cover letter to rajesh@globcomsolution.com
summary: Globcom Solutions is seeking a Motion Graphics Designer to create stunning animations and effects for digital content. The role involves collaborating with creative teams to produce high-quality visual assets.
